messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/27/2004 2:54:25 PM Eastern Daylight Time, tarasamja@sunflower.com writes: It still almost knocks me over everytime I hear my dad say
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/27/2004 2:54:25 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
tarasamja@... writes:
It still almost knocks me over everytime I hear my
dad say something like 'he's a kid, let him play, he's having fun',
when I would've gotten in big trouble, as a child, for doing the
same thing. I think life does give you that perspective. I don't
want to be sixty before I see things that way. Peace - Tara<<<<

You're not! <g>

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
